exercises.question: Translate to German: I have a lamp.
Translate to German: She buys a bag.
Translate to German: He sees a dog.
Translate to German: We need a room.
Translate to German: They have a pen.
Translate to German: You have a car.
Translate to German: She has a cat.
Translate to German: He finds a ball.
Translate to German: I see a watch.
Translate to German: We buy a book.
Translate to German: This is my bag.
Translate to German: That is your pen.
Translate to German: I see his dog.
Translate to German: She likes my lamp.
Translate to German: He has your car.
Translate to German: We see his cat.
Translate to German: I want your watch.
Translate to German: She finds my book.
Translate to German: That is his room.
Translate to German: You see my ball.
